entry.title: COLRv1 and CSS font-palette: Web Typography Gets Colorful
entry.summary: According to Toshi Omagari, the author of Arcade Game Typography, the worldâ€™s first multi-colored digital font was created in 1982 for a never-released video game called Insector. entry.title: Useful Tools for Creating AVIF Images
